Help What is this app for? This is a simple database for storing information about malfunctions of cars and any equipment that you can characterize by the parameters:\n Year of manufacture->\n Brand->\n Model->\n One of the model`s systems->\n Brief description of the malfunction->\n Detailed description + Photo. Great!
Attention! The Model depends on the Brand and Year. For example, if you selected the 2019 model year and the brand Audi, the Model field will only display the models you added for the 2019 Audi. This means that the 2019 Audi A5 and the 2025 Audi A5 are two different models. Ok!
Clue. To return not to the list, but to the entry, by collapsing the image, just click on the image once ;) Ok!
Important information! The database is created and deleted automatically when you install and uninstall the app in a secure storage. If you don`t export the database and uninstall the app, the data will be lost forever. The database is exported to the folder you specify as a JSON file and a folder containing images. Only completely unique records are imported. Understood!
